about.title: About
about.subtitle: The Studio
about.bio1: North Protocol is an indie game development studio founded by Fatih Northman, specializing in creating immersive gaming experiences across PC, console, and mobile platforms.
about.bio2: With a passion for innovative gameplay mechanics and stunning visuals, we bring unique game concepts to life using cutting-edge technology and creative design.

contact.title: Let's Build The Future
contact.desc: North Protocol is always open to new collaborations and challenges. Reach out to build something extraordinary.
contact.footer: Â© {{year}} North Protocol. All Rights Reserved.
